leve.name: Never Strikes Twice
leve.description: It has been recently discovered that sylphs are branding trees with what appears to be the mark of the primal Ramuh. While the significance of these marks is still not fully understood, it is unlikely that the tribe's intentions are good, and therefore the Wood Wailers seek assistance from local adventurers in the removal of the brands.
leve.client: Fourth Spear Wood Wailer, Florimond the Fleet
